definition: (flying) wing to wing
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
euphemistic variant of 屄[bi1]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
surname Yi/alternative name for 絳|绛[Jiang4] capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
wing/area surrounding the bullseye of a target/to assist/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/old variant of 翌
lit. a pair of birds flying close together (idiom)/fig. two hearts beating as one/name of a sweet and sour chicken wing dish
to fly wing to wing (idiom)/two hearts beating as one/(of a couple) inseparable
In the sky to be two birds flying wing to wing, on earth to be two trees with branches intertwined/wishing for conjugal bliss
pinyin: zai4 tian1 yuan4 zuo4 bi3 yi4 niao3 , zai4 di4 yuan4 zuo4 lian2 li3 zhi1
containing_words.word: 在天願做比翼鳥，在地願做連理枝

sentences.english: Let's reach for the sky together. Happy New Year!
sentences.chinese: 讓我們比翼雙飛到天際。新年快樂!

sentences.english: I looked up at those twin kites.
sentences.chinese: 我擡眼看看那比翼齊飛的風箏。

sentences.english: That we wish, to be the inseparable birds flying in the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 在天願作比翼鳥，在地願爲連理枝。

sentences.english: She hopes that she, and her love can keep each other company throughout the journey of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 她的願望就是和愛人在人生的旅途上比翼齊飛。

sentences.english: Yong-tie the knot, BizArt Shuangfei, love each other.
sentences.chinese: 永結同心，比翼雙飛，相親相愛。

sentences.english: Well find a rainbow together, just like birds of the same feather.
sentences.chinese: 如同比翼鳥一般，我們一齊飛去找彩虹。

sentences.english: To make the life and the design more simple and beautiful, Periano Design, keep creating.
sentences.chinese: 讓設計與生活更簡單，更美好，比翼鳥一直在創造。

rhinoceros horn, reputed to confer telepathic powers/fig. mutual sensitivity/tacit exchange of romantic feelings/a meeting of minds

qin and se, two string instruments that play in perfect harmony/marital harmony

nymphalid/butterfly

a beautiful woman/graceful and elegant posture/moon
